origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.calculate_ROI', 'description': 'This function calculates the Return on Investment (ROI) for a specified company and investment type over a given time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company for which ROI is being calculated.'}, {'name': 'investment_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of investment for which ROI is being calculated, e.g., fintech.'}, {'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period over which ROI is calculated, e.g., past five years.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ROI', 'description': 'The calculated Return on Investment in percentage format.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.calculate_ROI, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'京东数科', 'investment_type'是'金融科技', 'time_period'是'过去五年'.
